file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: API
  version: 1.0.0
  contact:
    name: example.com
    email: foo@bar.com
    url: https://foobar.com
tags:
  - name: tag
    description: A tag
paths:
  x-foo/bar:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
  /test:
    $ref: '#/paths/x-foo~1bar'
